problem.markdown:
As we increase pressure from 0.15 MPa to 25 MPa for water at T[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline](0.15 MPa), its volume changes marginally. This demonstrates________________
( ) Compressibility of Liquid (x) Incompressibility of liquid ( ) That we can use Ideal gas approximation for the liquid
problem.p: As we increase pressure from 0.15 MPa to 25 MPa for water at T[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline](0.15 MPa), its volume changes marginally. This demonstrates________________

choicegroup.choice: That we can use Ideal gas approximation for the liquid
